channel.title: Tutorial on I make stuff

item.title: Use ES to filter MetricKit Data
item.description: You can use the powerful tools provided by ES to search all data you want, such as to extract or convert specific data. Fetch Count Use _count to query the count of the data which match the specific condition. 1 2 3 4 5 6 GET ios-metric-info/_count { "query": { "match": { "appVersion" : "6.60.0" } } } Result: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 { "count"
